diceFailedTooHigh:
Option `sides` is capped at 1000 to avoid abuse.
Please try again.
diceFailedTooLow:
How do you think this is going to work?
The minimum amount of `sides` one can have is 3.
errorDefault:
An error has occured, please try again
`{error}`
magicBallDescription: Lockyz Dev does not take responsibility for action taken based on the Magic 8balls answer.
magicBallDrink1: {user} drank the blue liquid inside the 8ball and died
magicBallDrink2: {user} drank the blue liquid inside the 8ball and can now see into the future
magicBallDrink3: {user} drank the blue liquid inside the 8ball and passed out
magicBallDrink4: {user} drank the blue liquid inside the 8ball and it tasted tangy
banUnbannable: Either my role is too low to ban this user or they have some sort of magical power.
noPermission: You don't have the permission to use this command
impostorInfo:
This command allows one to find the "Impostor" among us.
*Please Note that it's literally just a mathmatical calculation that randomly picks "Not"*
kickUnkickable: Either my role is too low to Kick this user or they have some sort of magical power.
giveawayNotFound: Unable to find the giveaway you're looking for.
owoWait: Give me just a second senpai-san. I enjoy it when you use me.
xpDisabled: The XP System is disabled through guild settings, a server owner should disable this command.
priacyResponse:
This bot was created by Lockyz Dev, we do not store any user information without prior consent. We also will not store any information for persons under the age of 13 as per Australian law.
By using our services you agree to the use of privatised data needed to access the Discord API. If you would like us to exclude you from any sort of data useage please DM our Admin "Robin Painter" and let them know.

You're welcome to view a more in-depth version of our privacy policy at: <https://lockyzdev.net/privacy>
